name: mongoosecrud
description:
express + mongoose crud ======================================================== review dan latihan ======================================================== 1. basicCRUD (orang+buku)
__Model__
>__Orang__: nama
__Buku__: judul, _pengarang 2. [LATIHAN] tambah genre ke buku ---> STOP!!!! Bikin dulu... ga usah populate
kalo bingung bs liat branch latihan/ wa poppy, no copas ya :D

__Model__
> __Orang__: nama
__Buku__: judul, _pengarang, [genre]
__Genre__: genre_name 3. routing genre dari buku
__Route__ Buku.js
> PUT /:id/add-genre (harus diatas PUT /:id biar ga ketimpa)
PUT /:id/delete-genre
